concise_definition: n. 轻拍, 轻敲; v. 轻拍, 轻敲

definitions.explanation_en: A light, quick tap or strike, often with the hand, typically expressing affection, reassurance, or casual attention.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指用手轻轻、快速地拍打或敲击，通常表达喜爱、安慰或随意的关注。
definitions.example_en: She gave the dog a gentle pat on the head.

definitions.explanation_en: A formulaic, overly simplistic, or clichéd remark, often used to describe speech that sounds insincere or overly comforting.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指一种公式化、过于简单化或陈词滥调的言论，常用来形容听起来虚伪或过度安慰的话。
definitions.example_en: His speech was full of pat answers to complex problems.
definitions.example_cn: 他的演讲充斥着对复杂问题的陈词滥调式回答。

definitions.explanation_en: To strike something lightly and repeatedly with the hand or a flat object, especially to show affection or comfort.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用手或扁平物体轻柔而重复地拍打某物，尤指表达喜爱或安慰。
definitions.example_en: He patted his pockets to make sure he had his keys.
definitions.example_cn: 他拍了拍口袋，确认钥匙还在。

definitions.explanation_en: To apply something with a light, even motion, such as spreading a substance or pressing it gently onto a surface.
definitions.explanation_cn: 以轻柔、均匀的动作涂抹或按压某物，如将物质轻敷于表面。
definitions.example_en: She patted the moisturizer onto her face.
definitions.example_cn: 她将保湿霜轻轻拍在脸上。

comparison.analysis: “Tap”（轻敲）更强调短暂、轻微的接触，常用于机械或节奏性动作，如敲击键盘或水龙头滴水；而 “pat” 更具情感色彩，常用于人际互动，带有温柔或安抚的意味。
“Stroke”（抚摸）指连续、滑动式的轻触，通常更缓慢、更温柔，常用于表达亲密或安抚，如抚摸头发；而 “pat” 是短促、断续的拍打，动作更机械、更表面，情感浓度较低。
“Pamper”（宠溺）指通过大量照顾或提供舒适来取悦某人，是一种持续性的行为；而 “pat” 是一个瞬间动作，即使带有情感，也不代表持续的关怀，仅是象征性的表达。
